questions.title: Question 2 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: In the general circulation of the atmosphere one would find the region called the doldrums:

questions.title: Question 3 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: A westerly wind means that the atmosphere:
questions.answer: B) is moving faster than the earth spins

mcq.option: A) would act to decrease the rotation of the earth
B) is moving faster than the earth spins
C) is moving slower than the earth spins
D) is moving as fast as the earth rotates

questions.title: Question 4 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: Which below is not an assumption of the single-cell model of the general circulation of the atmosphere?
questions.answer: B) the earth rotates once in 24 hours

mcq.option: A) the earth's surface is covered with water
B) the earth rotates once in 24 hours
C) the sun is always overhead at the equator

questions.title: Question 5 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: Which of the following is not true concerning an easterly wave?
questions.answer: B) has converging winds on its western side

mcq.option: A) moves from east to west
B) has converging winds on its western side
C) showers and thunderstorms may be found on its eastern side
D) indicates a region of lower-than-average pressure

questions.title: Question 6 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: Generally on an upper-level (100 mb) chart in the Northern Hemisphere during July we would expect to find the tropical easterly jet stream:
questions.answer: D) south of the upper-level subtropical high

mcq.option: A) north of the polar front
B) north of the upper-level subtropical high
C) directly over the polar front
D) south of the upper-level subtropical high

questions.title: Question 7 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: In terms of the three-cell model of the general circulation areas of surface low pressure should be found at:

mcq.option: A) the equator and the poles

questions.title: Question 8 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: Most of the United States is in what wind belt?

questions.title: Question 9 for Class CLIMATE102_191007
questions.main: According to the three-cell general circulation model at the equator we would not expect to find:
questions.answer: B) a ridge of high pressure

mcq.option: B) a ridge of high pressure
